item.title: Perl mojo
item.description: I enjoy writing small Perl scripts to perform admin tasks. A couple of days ago I had to delete more than 3000 messages in an email inbox, relaying only on POP3 to do it. Issuing 3000+ dele commands by hand was not a very desirable prospect, so I performed a CPAN search looking for POP3-handling modules. Bingo! Mail::Box::POP3 does the trick nicely. And it was already installed in my debian box, so I could proceed immediately:
